text: My mom sang in high school choir and so did my father.
author: Kevin Richardson

text: I also think a Hot Mom is someone who can connect with what's current in her kids' world.
author: Jami Gertz

text: Being a working mom is not easy. You have to be willing to screw up at every level.
author: Jami Gertz

text: As a mom, I always feel I have to protect them. I talk about them because they are the most important things in my life but they are private people. I won't use them for my own press.
author: Jami Gertz

text: It's hard either way, at home or on the bus, I think the hardest thing probably for me is going one second from being mom to right out on the stage and having to be that person too. It's hard to switch gears.
author: Lee Ann Womack
